name: Feast
overrideDescription: Trigger feeding on units with Eaten abilities.

additionalTooltips.title: Eaten
additionalTooltips.description: After the next round of combat, this unit will be eaten by the front unit without an Eaten ability.

cardLoreTooltips: Gorgers patrol the mines to collect errant Morsels, consuming them to return them back to the Shroud. They take great pleasure in their purpose, often consuming more Morsels than necessary.
